Blog.post: Haha sorry 4 nt updating my blog 4 years.... only thing is tt sch reopen le not enough tym to update my blog.... ok lets start wif monday... very happy day on monday coz i managed to go to k box wif the girl i lyk... n we even went back on cab together... lolx... so hapi... tuesday, the girl i like nvr go for geog remedial n ms kwa very angry... lets hope she will b a good gal n go 4 remedials from now on... we went to k box again n i accompany her in the cab again... so hapi... as long as she hapi can le... haha today wednesday le... lata still got el fantasia... a drama... lolx today write until here le tml den update... i luv u... Oliver...

today is a sad day... i tried to revise chemistry but can't simply too sad... maybe coz i juz finished wathing ci jin zhi dian ep 1 ba... aki n jr so xing fu... y cant real life be juz like tt...? i wanted to confess to a girl but fear the worst so i didnt dare... haha actually the show quite nice... u wan download go http://lameristic.blogdrive.com okiez???? haha today do lotz work n i reread fan fic by my frenz very nice.... http://www.winglin.net/fanfic/rEnfU_ruLez/ this is the address n another wan http://www.winglin.net/fanfic/tOnY4eVa/ this is also nice... the 2nd wan is very good story... muz go read wor... N also there is a 5566 fan club very good muz join if u r a 5566 fan... it is http://groups.msn.com/wuqianwubailiushiliu/ ok???? muz join wor... today i tired le... guess i end here tml den write more byezzzzz, Oliver

Still as sad as i was... but nvm los.... haha sry ar mani days nvr update again.... sianz ar.... now got many new songs but lamer haven update yet.... yesterday in gunbound, i did my 4th double kill... so hapi... haiz... nowadays c guan kiat n bren togther so xing fu, so hapi 4 them.... but 1 thing huh, kiat dun neglect ur brothers hor.... anyway i believe u won... coz bren also nvr neglect her sisters wad.... haha nvm hapi 4ever ok???? haha so good they can b together.... Christine i hope u can stand in others shoes n understand tt it is not always so easy to go home n take something 4 another person.... i believe u urself also muz haf forgot to do smth sometimes rite????? anyway if u wan angry den carry on los... anyway its ur cells tt die, not mine... haiz any way i now very sad so nth much to write ba... plz comment on my blog if u do read it... thx a lot....

Hizzzzzzzz... seems lyk i everyday got tym to update.... haha today is quite a good day... excepte haiz.... if u read my previous blog u will noe la.... but nvm... today we almost sabo mrs ang lehz.... all her fault. she told us yesterday that there would not be an assembly n we all nvr bring school tie... in the end there was n guess wad???? almost the whole class did not bring their tie...(actually some got bring but dun wan to wear la) so assembly mr chan c we all no tie call bren n degon up n ask y.... haha den we all say coz of amy ang.... today also actually if no assembly need stay back coz many pple nvr complete the history hmwk for holidays but, mrs ang gif us 1 more week... so good... first tym sia.... haha. aniwaez i m quite hapi today la.... so write longer... wonder when my frenz will come online to recieve files from me... waste my time muz wait for them.... haha... Wayne!!! dun too sad le la... in 2 daes sure patch de... haiz even if dun hor, dun too sad coz in this world there will be much more gals worthy for u.... haha sianz.... i wan go old changi hospital wif frenz on august the 13th but noone wan... it is a friday u noe???? n it is also the eve of my birthday... people taunt me to go makes me wanna go even more... they wan me bring a digital camara to take down some pics n show them.... i'll try okiez???? last but not least, u all muz buy lin jun jie album hor.... I love U still Oliver

today haf been the worst day in my whole life.... nvm... i noe whole to get thru this period.... i heard the gal i lyk lyk another guy le... haha nvm la...haiz wish them both hapiness ba...haiz today dun wan write much... post pics ba

Yo sorry i so many days nvr update again... i fell sick for the last few days so no time to update... haiz long weekend n so nv gt to c the person i lyk.... according to a classmate, the person i lyk went k box again... they haf too much $$$ dunno how to spend.... i am grounded so @ home the whole day.... haiz... i download ep 3 but doesn't work.... tml den download again.... haha i heard that kiat they all go movie ... so good sia... At home so sianz all enjoying i nth to do.... haha rem the address for downloading songs???? now gt many songs le... interested refer to my 1st post for details n go download.... ok today end here le i love u 4 eva.... oliver
